Name: Shining Cubes
About the game: Shining Cubes is a Tetris-style intellectual game with a modern twist. We all love to spend some free time playing a good game. Shining Cubes will immerse you in interesting gameplay and relaxing music! Three cubes of different colors fall from above. Match the same cubes 3 in a row to get points! Classic gameplay from 90s video games is brought to you with good 3D graphics and great music! The game has a high score table! Compete with other players! Key features of the game: - 3D style of the game; - Built-in table of records; - Nice soundtrack.
